## Context

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/commands/Context.ts" sourceLine="200" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents the execution context for a command, providing access to Discord.js objects,
command metadata, and various utility methods for command execution.

```ts title="Signature"
class Context<ExecutionMode extends CommandExecutionMode = CommandExecutionMode, Args extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>> {
    public readonly interaction: ContextParameters<ExecutionMode>['interaction'];
    public readonly message: ContextParameters<ExecutionMode>['message'];
    public readonly guild!: Guild | null;
    public readonly guildId!: string | null;
    public readonly channel!: TextBasedChannel | null;
    public readonly channelId!: string | null;
    public readonly client: Client;
    public readonly command: LoadedCommand;
    constructor(commandkit: CommandKit, config: ContextParameters<ExecutionMode, Args>)
    store: void
    commandName: string
    invokedCommandName: string
    options: CommandContextOptions<ExecutionMode>
    forwarded: boolean
    forwardCommand(command: C) => Promise<never>;
    executionMode: ExecutionMode
    isInteraction() => this is InteractionCommandContext;
    isChatInputCommand() => this is ChatInputCommandContext;
    isAutocomplete() => this is AutocompleteCommandContext;
    isMessageContextMenu() => this is MessageContextMenuCommandContext;
    isUserContextMenu() => this is UserContextMenuCommandContext;
    isMessage() => this is Context<'message'>;
    getCommandIdentifier() => string;
    getGuildLocale() => Locale | null;
    getUserLocale() => Locale | null;
    getLocale(preferUser:  = false) => Locale;
    setLocale(locale: Locale | null) => void;
    clone(config?: Partial<ContextParameters<ExecutionMode>>) => Context<ExecutionMode>;
    isMiddleware() => this is MiddlewareContext<ExecutionMode>;
    args() => string[];
}
```

### interaction

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/context-parameters#contextparameters'>ContextParameters</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;['interaction']`}   />

The interaction that triggered the command.
### message

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/context-parameters#contextparameters'>ContextParameters</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;['message']`}   />

The message that triggered the command.
### guild

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Guild | null`}   />

The guild where the command was triggered.
### guildId

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string | null`}   />

The guild ID where the command was triggered.
### channel

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`TextBasedChannel | null`}   />

The channel where the command was triggered.
### channelId

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string | null`}   />

The channel id where the command was triggered.
### client

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Client`}   />

The client instance.
### command

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/loaded-command#loadedcommand'>LoadedCommand</a>`}   />

The command that this context belongs to.
### constructor

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(commandkit: <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/command-kit#commandkit'>CommandKit</a>, config: <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/context-parameters#contextparameters'>ContextParameters</a>&#60;ExecutionMode, Args&#62;) => Context`}   />

Creates a new command context.
### store

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={``}   />

The shared key-value store for this context. This can be used to store data that needs to be shared between middlewares or commands.
This store is shared across all contexts in the same command execution, including the cloned contexts and middleware contexts.
### commandName

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

Gets the name of the current command.
### invokedCommandName

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

Gets the invoked command name (could be an alias for message commands)
### options

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/command-context-options#commandcontextoptions'>CommandContextOptions</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;`}   />

Gets the command options based on the execution mode.
### forwarded

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

Whether this context was forwarded from another context. This happens when a command forwards its context to another command.
### forwardCommand

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(command: C) => Promise&#60;never&#62;`}   />

Forwards the context to another command. The target handler will be the same as current handler.
### executionMode

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`ExecutionMode`}   />

The execution mode of the command.
### isInteraction

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/interaction-command-context#interactioncommandcontext'>InteractionCommandContext</a>`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by an interaction.
### isChatInputCommand

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/chat-input-command-context#chatinputcommandcontext'>ChatInputCommandContext</a>`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by a slash command interaction.
### isAutocomplete

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/autocomplete-command-context#autocompletecommandcontext'>AutocompleteCommandContext</a>`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by an autocomplete interaction.
### isMessageContextMenu

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/message-context-menu-command-context#messagecontextmenucommandcontext'>MessageContextMenuCommandContext</a>`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by a message context menu interaction.
### isUserContextMenu

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/user-context-menu-command-context#usercontextmenucommandcontext'>UserContextMenuCommandContext</a>`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by a user context menu interaction.
### isMessage

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/context#context'>Context</a>&#60;'message'&#62;`}   />

Whether the command was triggered by a message.
### getCommandIdentifier

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => string`}   />

Returns the command identifier.
### getGuildLocale

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => Locale | null`}   />

Returns the locale of the guild where this command was triggered.
### getUserLocale

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => Locale | null`}   />

Returns the locale of the user who triggered this command.
### getLocale

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(preferUser:  = false) => Locale`}   />

Returns the locale for this command.
### setLocale

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(locale: Locale | null) => void`}   />

Sets the locale for this command.
### clone

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(config?: Partial&#60;<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/context-parameters#contextparameters'>ContextParameters</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;&#62;) => <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/context#context'>Context</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;`}   />

Creates a clone of this context
### isMiddleware

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => this is <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/middleware-context#middlewarecontext'>MiddlewareContext</a>&#60;ExecutionMode&#62;`}   />

Checks if this context is a middleware context.
### args

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => string[]`}   />

Gets the command arguments (only available for message commands).
